text: I didn't buy this product off Amazon (sorry, guys!) but I normally buy it at school for a quick and mostly healthy snack in between classes. I'm surprised at all the negative reviews. I am a very picky eater and I really like these bars. They  satisfy my craving for something sweet while still being healthy. I also love the fact that one bar really fills me up, as it normally takes 2 fruit or granola bars to do the same.
